channel.title: Master Control :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description:
flowchart TB; TapIn(( Bang In)) PattrIn(( Pattr In )) SongDataIn((Song Data
In)) GetTempo[Get Tempo] Clock[Beat Clock] GetLabel[Get Label] Out((( ))) TapIn-- bang -->GetTempo PattrIn -- initial tempo --> GetTempo PattrIn -- start beat,
end beat,
loop-section beats,
loop section active --> GetTempo GetTempo-- bang -->Clock GetTempo-- Tempo -->Out Clock-- beat number -->GetLabel Clock-- Beat Number -->Out GetLabel-- Label -->Out SongDataIn-- Song Data ----> GetLabel Master Control Master Clock - outputs a beat number when it receives a bang - increments its beat number with each output, but also keeps track of position in a song form and adjusts the beat in accordance if looped.
